title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting a file in Navigator, and then choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', while the file is already open with a different type of editor, nothing happens. The existing editor is not replaced.
EB: When selecting a file in Navigator, and then choosing 'Open With... / Default Text Editor', while the file is already open with a different type of editor, a new editor window should open with the file, replacing the existing editor.
SR:
1. Open the software
2. Create a new basic project
3. Create a new file called 'test.xml'
4. Open the file 'test.xml' with the scripted resource editor example (to reproduce the issue, the scripted resource editor should be set as the default editor for XML files)
5. Open the Navigator
6. Select the file 'test.xml'
7. Right-click on the file and choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'
8. Observe that nothing happens. The existing scripted resource editor remains active, and a new editor with the default text editor is not opened as expected.
